articles.title: Israeli soldiers fatally shot an American woman at a West Bank protest, witnesses say - The Associated Press
articles.description: Two witnesses tell The Associated Press that Israeli soldiers fatally shot an American woman participating in a protest against settlements in the West Bank. The U.S. government confirmed the death of 26-year-old Aysenur Ezgi Eygi but did not say whether she …
articles.content: NABLUS, West Bank (AP) Israeli soldiers killed an American woman demonstrating against settlements in the West Bank on Friday, according to two witnesses who said what began as a peaceful demonstrati… [+6444 chars]

articles.author: Ahjané Forbes
articles.title: LL Flooring, formerly Lumber Liquidators, closing all 400-plus stores amid bankruptcy - USA TODAY
articles.description: American flooring company LL Flooring announced that it will be closing all its more than 400 stores, with sales starting Friday.
articles.content:
American flooring company LL Flooring announced it will be closing its stores, with closing sales starting on Friday, Sept. 6. 
Since opening its doors in 1993, LL Flooring has operated more than 40… [+3022 chars]

articles.title: Sluggish US jobs report clears the way for Federal Reserve to cut interest rates - The Associated Press

articles.title: The Putin Propaganda Chief Who the U.S. Says Is Now After American Minds - The Wall Street Journal

articles.content:
